Submodules

finagg.yfinance.api module

Simple wrappers for Yahoo! Finance.

finagg.yfinance.api.get(ticker: str, /, *, start: None | str = None, end: None | str = None, interval: str = '1d', period: str = 'max', debug: bool = False) → DataFrame[source]

Get a ticker’s stock price history.

Does a simple transform on Yahoo! Finance’s ticker API dataframe result to be a bit more consistent with other API implementations.

Parameters:

  • ticker – Company ticker to get historical price data for.

  • start – Start date for stock price history. Defaults to the first recorded date.

  • end – End date for stock price history. Defaults to the last recorded date.

  • interval – Frequency at which stock price history is grabbed.

  • period – Time period to get in the past. "max" returns the full stock price history and the default.

  • debug – Debug mode passed to the Yahoo! Finance scraper.

Returns:

Yahoo! Finance auto-adjusted stock price history with slightly different (more normalized) column names.

Examples

>>> finagg.yfinance.api.get("AAPL").head(5)  
         date    open    high     low   close     volume ticker
0  1980-12-12  0.0997  0.1002  0.0997  0.0997  469033600   AAPL
1  1980-12-15  0.0950  0.0950  0.0945  0.0945  175884800   AAPL
2  1980-12-16  0.0880  0.0880  0.0876  0.0876  105728000   AAPL
3  1980-12-17  0.0897  0.0902  0.0897  0.0897   86441600   AAPL
4  1980-12-18  0.0924  0.0928  0.0924  0.0924   73449600   AAPL

finagg.yfinance.sql module

Yahoo! finance SQLAlchemy interfaces.

finagg.yfinance.sql.metadata

The metadata associated with all SQL tables defined in this module.

finagg.yfinance.sql.prices

SQL table for storing raw data as managed by finagg.yfinance.feat.prices (an alias for finagg.yfinance.feat.Prices).

finagg.yfinance.sql.daily

SQL table for storing refined data as managed by finagg.yfinance.feat.daily (an alias for finagg.yfinance.feat.Daily).

Module contents

Top-level yfinance interface.
